overview:
Harald is Co-founder and Partner at Nascent Blue Inc.

He has provided IT guidance to Fortune 500 clients for nearly 20 years and at all levels of the organization. He has played a central role in the planning and execution of several enterprise- and internet-scale mission-critical solutions. Haraldâ€™s leadership in the architecture, technology, planning, and execution disciplines has helped organizations adopt new methodologies, processes, and technologies.

Harald has served clients in the Banking, Airline, Brokerage, Network Technology, Logistics, Project Delivery, Government, Environment, and Telecommunication sectors. He has held advisory positions with Technology Vendors and Clients in the areas of model-based approaches (MDA), business process and system analysis methodologies, service-based architectures (CORBA, SOA), and data center resource virtualization.
